Title: Authorizes the village of Pittsford, town of Pittsford, Monroe county to lower the speed limit on state roads to not less than twenty-five miles per hour
Summary: Authorizes the village of Pittsford, town of Pittsford, Monroe county, to lower the speed limit on village roads to not less than twenty-five miles per hour.
LawCode: Amd ยง1643, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to speed limits in the village of Pittsford, town of Pittsford, county of Monroe
